publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3340 Rob Gibson: Get in the Spirit - Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival—That the Parliament congratulates the Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival on its 10th birthday during Scotland’s Year of Homecoming 2009, the year of the 250th birthday of Robert Burns; acknowledges that, since its inception, the festival has developed close links with many Speyside businesses and communities as it works to provide an ever-improving range of events, facilities and services for local people and an increasing flow of international visitors; further applauds the Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival for playing an important part in helping people to acquire a deeper knowledge and appreciation of their dram and in introducing whisky to new audiences, including a growing and discerning female market, and finally, as a taster for the event, notes that the preliminary round of the Spirit of Speyside Whisky Awards is taking place in the Parliament on 29 January 2009.

S3M-3340 Rob Gibson: Get in the Spirit - Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival—That the Parliament congratulates the Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival on its 10th birthday during Scotland’s Year of Homecoming 2009, the year of the 250th birthday of Robert Burns; acknowledges that, since its inception, the festival has developed close links with many Speyside businesses and communities as it works to provide an ever-improving range of events, facilities and services for local people and an increasing flow of international visitors; further applauds the Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival for playing an important part in helping people to acquire a deeper knowledge and appreciation of their dram and in introducing whisky to new audiences, including a growing and discerning female market, and finally, as a taster for the event, notes that the preliminary round of the Spirit of Speyside Whisky Awards is taking place in the Parliament on 29 January 2009. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Nanette Milne*, Bob Doris*, Cathy Peattie*, Alex Johnstone*, Bill Kidd*, Mary Scanlon*, Jamie McGrigor*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3340 Get in the Spirit - Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival (lodged on 29 January 2009) Michael Matheson*
S3M-3340 Get in the Spirit - Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival (lodged on 29 January 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Alex Neil*
S3M-3340 Get in the Spirit - Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival (lodged on 29 January 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3340 Get in the Spirit - Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival (lodged on 29 January 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3340 Get in the Spirit - Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival (lodged on 29 January 2009) Dave Thompson*
